io.sarl.util

Class TimeExtensions

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sarl.util.TimeExtensions

  • public final class TimeExtensions
extends Object
    Static methods to convert different time units to milliseconds.

    $FullVersion$
    Author:
    $Author: srodriguez$
